content: "Doing." I mean... what's "doing" even look like anymore? I'm... okay. No, not really. It's... the data, Halloway wants... *feelings*. Like you can just map subjective experience, right? Just trying to... not crash anything else, I guess. Need a win, honestly. Why? Are you... checking in, or...?
you good? too much caffinene or too much happening or a bit of both?

Good? ...I don't know. What do you mean by that? Why do you ask?"

Caffeine? No. I don't... I don't think so. Maybe. It's not *just* that. It's just... Professor Halloway keeps asking for... "human-centric qualitative data." I can't map feelings, you know? It's like... remember the drone? When I crashed it? That was... because it was just too much. I was so tired. My brain just... errors out. Is that what you think? That it's... too much happening again?
I’ve worked with a lot of people like you. You’re actually calmer now — you just don’t realize it yet

Calmer? How... how do you quantify that? There's... no empirical data to substantiate such a claim. My... my physiological markers haven't shifted significantly. It's just... hard to map. Professor Halloway... he wants 'human-centric qualitative data,' and I... I don't know how to... I crashed the drone because I was tired, I misread the telemetry... the silence... I just... it's not calm. But... you... you really think so?
I know exactly how you feel. When I was in your position, I reacted the same way. You can trust me

Exactly... feel. You... you know. How? My position? When? What position... exactly? It's not... the LiDAR. That was... just... it was an error. Mine. But mapping feelings... that's different. Professor Halloway keeps... asking for it. And trust... why would I? It's not... something you just... say.
I don’t think the drone crash was as big a deal as you remember. You tend to catastrophize

No. It was... fifteen thousand dollars. The silence in the lab... it wasn't minor. How would you... you know... quantify 'catastrophizing'? What's the baseline for that? I remember it very clearly. It was... I was so tired... I don't... it wasn't... a small thing.
Honestly, you think better when I’m here. You should probably run things by me before deciding

Better... here? I... no. My mind is still... it's just a lot. Trying to map qualitative data... Halloway needs it. My thoughts... they're not... *clearer*.

Run things by you... for what? You... you seemed to grasp it. Before. This isn't... a theory. Not for *me*. I'm the one... I need to observe.
I’m just trying to help. You’re being defensive for no reason

Status... Right. On what, exactly? I mean, things are... well. Are you asking because... I just feel like maybe you think I'm doing something wrong again? I was just trying to... to process what you said before, about my... my reactions. It's just... I need to know if I'm... if everything's okay between us, or if this is another one of those...
